descriptionHtml:
These mods replace the skyrim Werewolf (also the replacement of the Werewolf transformation) with a new Creature: Guar or Raptor or Dwarven Punisher or Flesh Grinder or Frost Lurker or Xenomorph or Flame Lurker or Armored [url=http://www.giantbomb.com/daedroth/3015-3087/ ]Daedroth[/url] or WereDovahbear* or Shoggoth or Nekker or Nekker Warrior or Benthic Hunter or Natural Werewolf* or Werewolf King* or WereSkeever or Female Werewolf or Male Werewolf* or WereTiger or Goatman or Hunger (2) or Snow Devil or Ogre or Bullvore or Dragon Man or WereCrocodile* (2) or New Gargoyle or Afflicted or DaedraGrub or WWolf* or WereBoar* or WereMammoth or WereVulture* or WereLion* or WereLioness* or WereShark*

* [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Lycanthropes]Lycanthropes [/url]


All my Replacers and MORE ! are in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86533/?] Werewolves (Werebeasts) House[/url]


[size=4][color=#ff0000] Do not install this until you have changed into a werewolf at least once[/color][/size]

[url=http://www.wikihow.com/Become-a-Werewolf-in-Skyrim]How to Become a Werewolf in Skyrim ?[/url]


You can change very easily the .esp and the .bsa (No problem with the saves ! No special precautions necessary. After deactivating the mod or removing the mod/files, any Werewolves found in your savegames will revert back to their default look.)

The DLCs (Dawnguard,Dragonborn) are not required (Guar, Raptor, Dwarven Punisher, Flesh Grinder, Frost Lurker, Xenomorph, Flame Lurker, Armored Daedroth, Nekker, Nekker Warrior, Natural Werewolf, Werewolf King, Female Werewolf, Male Werewolf, WereTiger, Goatman, Hunger-s-, Snow Devil, Ogre, Bullvore, Dragon Man, WereCrocodile, Afflicted, DaedraGrub, WWolf, WereBoar, WereMammoth, WereVulture,WereLion, WereLioness, WereShark and New Gargoyle)

[color=#ff0000] DLC DRAGONBORN REQUIRED for WereDovahbear, Shoggoth, Benthic Hunter, WereSkeever[/color]

Some of these Creatures are also in my other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30328/? ] Summon Werewolf and Co - Mounts and Followers [/url] (with an other Daedroth and some companions: Daedroth, Guar, Raptor, Xenomorph...)

[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedroth_(Oblivion)]Daedroth (Oblivion) [/url]
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedroth_(Morrowind)]Daedroth (Morrowind)[/url]
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedroth_(Online)]Daedroth (Online) [/url]

[color=#00ff00] Miscellaneous Files: Pack of 32 Werewolf Replacers (Guar, Raptor, Armored Daedroth, Dwarven Punisher, Flesh Grinder, Frost Lurker, Xenomorph, Flame Lurker, Nekker, Nekker Warrior, WereDovahbear, Shoggoth, Benthic Hunter, Natural Werewolf, Werewolf King, WereSkeever, Female Werewolf, Male Werewolf, WereTiger, Goatman, Hunger (2), Snow Devil, Ogre, Bullvore, Dragon Man, WereCrocodile, Afflicted, DaedraGrub, WWolf, New Gargoyle and WereBoar )[/color]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=2171568Replacers.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/2171568Replacers.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=7740795replacers.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/7740795replacers.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Video with some creatures of the version 1.3 between 5’10’’ and 12’35’’[/color] (Thanks to KnightStreakGaming)
